amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the expansion of information reporting requirements to payments made to corporations, payments for property and other gross proceeds, and rental property expense payments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 161 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 161 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Johanns. (consideration: CR S1649, S1668-1669; text: CR S1649) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the expansion of information reporting requirements to payments made to corporations, payments for property and other gross proceeds, and rental property expense payments, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 161 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Johanns.
